### Fig. 1
\[
F(x) = 
\begin{cases}
  1 & x < 0 \\
  1 & 0 \leq x \leq 1 \\ 
  0 & x > 1
\end{cases}
\]

\[ 
x \in \mathbb{R}
\]

### Fig. 2 
\[
P(X \leq x | X > 0 ) = \frac{P(X \leq x , X > 0 )}{P(X > 0)} = \frac{P(0 < X \leq x)}{P(X > 0)} = \frac{F(x) - F(0)}{1 - F(0)}
\]

Giving: 

\[
P(X \leq x | X > 0 ) = 
\begin{cases}
  0 & x \leq 0 \\
  x & 0 < x \leq 1 \\ 
  1 & x > 1
\end{cases}
\]

### Fig. 3 

\[
1 = \int\limits_{\infty}^{\infty}{\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}}x^2 e^{\frac{-x^2}{2}}dx} = \frac{2}{\sqrt{2\pi}}\int\limits_{0}^{\infty}{x^2 e^{\frac{-x^2}{2}}dx}
\]
